description.en: The manga follows the daily lives of Kou, a slightly quirky man, and his wife, Yukio (often called Yuki), who is a cross dressing man. Read as this married couple handles the trouble that comes with cross dressing in modern Japanese society.
description.es: El manga sigue la vida cotidiana de Kō, un hombre un poco raro, y su esposa, Yukio (a menudo llamada Yuki), que es un hombre que se trasviste. Ve como esta pareja recién casada se encarga de los problemas que conlleva el ser aceptado en la sociedad japonesa moderna.

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

description.en: Mizumura Shinta didn’t know what to make of the situation when the sexiest girl in school, Kishimoto Ririsu, starts seducing him and things get extremely physical. Shinta isn’t rich or the popular guy in school so it doesn’t make sense that Ririsu would be so interested in him. But Ririsu is in fact a vampire, a secret that she will kill to keep hidden. As the relationship between Shinta and Ririsu grows, it gets harder for her to keep the secret hidden. And when those close to him, like his semi-romantic childhood friend Makimura Chizuru, are involuntarily thrown into the chaos, deep dark secrets get revealed.
description.ja: 「中出しのセッ●スって…超気持ちイイんだよ？」童貞の俺がハーフの女の子から、いきなり中出しを強要され!?　東京の某ミッション系短大に通う主人公の心太は、平穏且つ平凡な毎日を過ごしていた。そんなある日、学園に転入してきた謎のハーフ美少女リリスとの出会いにより彼の生活は大きく変化する…。理由もわからぬまま、突然リリスから濃厚なキスをされ、熱くなった股間を強く上下に動かされ…。「私が妊娠しちゃうくらい…キミの精子、たっぷり注ぎ込んで…？」心太を誘惑するリリスの本当の思惑とは…。

altTitles.th: บุตรสาวของจอมเวท

description.en:
Maybelle had lived a life of abuse under her parents. Upon discovery that these 'parents' aren't her true biological parents and that somewhere, her father exists, with a sad heart, Maybelle sets off in search of him.

---
Mabel’s been mocked her whole life for her nonexistent magical ability, but when she finally meets her true father, it’s the all-powerful archmage, Raquiel! Forced by an imperial pact to let her go long ago, he can now welcome her into his home, with his half-wolf butler, three nymph sisters, a fox halfling, and a kind disciple to watch over her. But dark secrets from his past threaten to catch up with them. Will his magic be enough to protect her? Could she even come into a power all her own?
description.ru: При своих родителях Мэйбел прожила жизнь, полную насилия. Однажды обнаружив, что эти "родители" не являются ей биологическими и что где-то находится ее настоящий отец, с тоскою на сердце Мэйбел отправляется на его поиски.
description.pt-br: Maybelle tinha vivido uma vida de abuso sob seus pais. Ao descobrir que esses ‘pais’ não são seus verdadeiros pais biológicos e que, em algum lugar, seu pai existe, Maybelle parte em busca dele.

description.ru: Вот и наступили мирные деньки очень популярного произведения «Великий из Бродячих Псов» ☆ Персонажи Вооружённого Детективного Агентства и Портовой мафии стали чиби?! Тёплые шуточные истории про Ацуши и остальных только начинаются!

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

To Be a Power in the Shadows!

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)
description.es-la: Tal cual como todos adoraban héroes en su niñez, cierto adolescente adoraba los poderes que se esconden en las sombras. Tras haber ocultado su fuerza y viviendo la vida mediocre de un mob durante el día y entrenando descontroladamente por la noche, él finalmente reencarna en un mundo diferente y gana el poder definitivo. El adolescente que solo juega a ser una eminencia en las sombras, sus subordinados confusos, y una gigante organización en las sombras que es pisoteada... Esta es la historia de un adolescente que adoraba esos poderes en las sombras y que posiblemente llegue a reinar en las sombras de otro mundo.

description.ru: События манги перенесут нас на 5 лет назад, в то время, когда Убийца Гоблинов только закончил свои тренировки и расстался с мастером. Манга поведает нам о том, чем занимался Убийца Гоблинов все эти 5 лет до встречи с Жрицей.

description.en: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak!
description.ja: 祓清は史上最強の悪祓士（エクソシスト）。弱冠16歳にして初任務にあたっていた。しかし、本当は超ビビり＋ド級の人見知りで…!?　ほんの少しの勇気を胸に、悪魔を祓え!!
description.es-la: El exorcista más poderoso de la historia--¡Kiyoshi! Para poder proteger aquello que considera precioso, Kiyoshi ha obtenido una fuerza sin igual. Pero tiene un secreto que no puede revelar... ¡Conviértete en una espada que corta el mal! ¡Se un escudo que protege a los débiles! ¡Todo eso y más se junta en esta nueva serie de exorcismo, batallas y comedia!
description.pt-br: O exorcista mais poderoso da história: Kiyoshi Harai! Para proteger o que é precioso para ele, Kiyoshi atingiu a força suprema. Mas ele tem um segredo que não pode contar a ninguém... ele virou a espada que erradica o mal! O escudo que protege os fracos! Tudo se junta nessa nova série dramática de comédia e batalha de exorcistas!

description.en:
A boy named Oda Nobusuke is very infatuated with billiards. Problems arise when a new student body president, Mako, suddenly decided to cut the funding for his billiards club. Unhappy with that, Oda wants to convince Mako that his billiards club is worthy of the funding. He decided to challenge a two-time former national billiards champion. Will Oda be able to defend his club?

description.en: More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！

description.de:
Ein gut aussehender, narzisstischer Adliger verliebt sich in eine hübsche, zuvorkommende Bürgerliche — so sollte zumindest der ursprüngliche Plot aussehen. Als eine normale Schülerin jedoch als Nebenfigur in ihrem Lieblingsroman aufwacht, ändert sich die Handlung, weil die Hauptfigur des Romans, Herzog Zeronis de Ingrid, ein Auge auf sie geworfen hat! Kann Ripley die ursprüngliche Handlung bewahren, während sie die Avancen des Herzogs ablehnt und versucht, den Machenschaften der Schurkin nicht zum Opfer zu fallen?

description.en:
Due to a mistake one night, I became the target of the most obsessive man and a villainess!

After possessing Ripley, a count’s daughter and an extra in a novel, I became the female lead. Since this is the case, I will try to enjoy the riches and luxuries of a nobleman that I couldn’t experience in my past life.

I can remember up to drinking alone in a corner at a party… but I woke up the next day in the male lead’s bed!

Ripley became the target of the villainess after the male lead’s remarks that she should be responsible for spending their first night together. Knowing the fate of the female lead, Ripley tries to get rid of the male lead by causing trouble, not washing, and all sorts of things. Nevertheless, the male lead’s unwavering single-minded heart begins to shake.

*Based on the webnovel written by HWANG DoTol with insert art by MSG.*

---
A handsome, selfish noble falls for a beautiful, kind commoner -- at least, that’s how the story’s supposed to go. When an average college student wakes up as Ripley, an extra in her favorite romance novel, she resolves to enjoy the luxuries of her character’s status while watching the novel's plot unfold from the sidelines. However, her plans are soon derailed when she finds herself in bed with no other than Duke Zeronis, the novel’s hero! Dodging the villainess’ schemes, the Duke’s advances, and her own feelings, can Ripley keep the story on track and survive beyond the first night?

---

description.es:
Un noble guapo y egoísta se enamora de una plebeya hermosa y sensible... Así debería ser la historia, ¿no? Un día, una estudiante universitaria se despierta en el cuerpo de Ripley, un personaje secundario de su novela romántica favorita, y decide que lo mejor será disfrutar de los lujos de esta nueva vida mientras observa cómo se desarrolla la trama. Sin embargo, sus planes se arruinan cuando, al día siguiente, amanece en la cama junto al duque Zeronis, el protagonista de la novela. Entre las estratagemas de la villana, los avances del duque y sus propios sentimientos, ¿podrá Ripley mantenerse al margen de la historia? ¿Sobrevivirá a esa primera noche?

소설 속 엑스트라인 백작 영애 리플리로 빙의 된 여주인공.
이왕 이렇게 된 거 전생에 경험하지 못한 귀족의 화려하고 풍족한 삶을 만끽하기로 한다.
파티장 구석에서 혼자 술을 즐긴 것까진 기억나는데… 
다음날 깨어보니 남주의 침대에 누워있는 것 아닌가!

description.ru:
После реинкарнации в Рипли, дочь графа из романа, я стала главной героиней. Я постараюсь насладиться богатством и роскошью дворянки, так как в прошлой жизни не могла этого делать. Помню, как одна пила на вечеринке… но на следующий день я проснулась в чужой постели!
Рипли стала мишенью злодея после замечаний главного героя, что она должна понести ответственность за проведение их первой ночи вместе. Зная судьбу главной героини, Рипли пытается избавиться от него, создавая разные проблемы. Тем не менее непоколебимое сердце главного героя начинает дрожать.

description.tr:
Yakışıklı ve bencil bir asil, güzel ve kibar bir sıradan insandan hoşlanır -- en azından, hikaye böyle devam etmelidir. Ortalama bir üniversite öğrencisi, en sevdiği romantik romanın bir ek karakteri olan Ripley olarak uyandığında kenardan romanın olay örgüsünün gelişmesini izlerken karakterinin statüsünün getirdiği lükslüğün tadını çıkarmaya karar verir. Ancak, kendisini romanın kahramanı Dük Zeronis ile yatakta bulduğunda planları kısa sürede raydan çıkar! Kötü karakterlerin entrikalarından, Dük'ün yakınlaşma çabalarından ve kendi hislerinden kaçan Ripley, hikayeyi yoluna koyabilecek ve ilk gecenin ötesinde hayatta kalabilecek midir?

description.vi:
Ripley - người mà nữ chính xuyên không vào là con gái của một nhà Bá tước, đồng thời cũng là cái bóng đèn quần chúng rực rỡ của cuốn tiểu thuyết "Đoá hoa của Elonell".

Đã quần chúng lại còn rực rỡ là nói thú vui tao nhã của tác giả cuốn sách =)) author phát cuồng với nhân vật tóc vàng mắt xanh nên từ chính phụ đến làm nền, bẻ sang boss cuối đều chung một style nốt. Những người có màu tóc màu mắt không thuộc dạng phong trào yellow blue thì xác định là bóng đèn con ghẻ say đ*o có đất diễn.

Về nguyên tác câu chuyện gốc, nam chính là Công tước trẻ tuổi nhất đế chế, đồng thời cũng là pay-lắk boi dở hơi nhưng được cái đẹp mã nên hút fan zl, tóm lại mọi lời thoại tả về ổng đều kiểu:" Chechow-er được mỗi cái mặt". Trái ngược hoàn toàn với nam chính Công tước, nữ chính Etolie là con gái nuôi của nhà Nam tước, công dung ngôn hạnh không thiếu nửa phần, đích thị là "con nhà người ta ver tiểu thuyết"
description.zh:
穿越后竟成了女配？
杯具啊为什么不是女主！
一瞬间穿越到小说里，成为了名字都记不清的女配。本想尽情享受奢华生活，可是穿越第二天，我就不小心夺走了某人的初夜。问题在于，那人竟然是小说里的头号执着男，男一号！

altTitles.en: The White of a Flower Lamp

description.en: A mysterious disease in which one day people suddenly rise back from the Underworld: The Withering Death. When Kiso, a newspaper journalist, starts investigating the strange disease, he is attacked by a grotesque-looking demon. The one who saves him is a girl he had met by chance… The girl, whom Kiso is peculiarly drawn to, for some reason calls herself a "Demon's Burning Light"…?
description.ja: 死んだ人が、ある日突然黄泉帰る、謎の病気『枯死病』。新聞記者の木曽は、この奇妙な病の取材をしていた最中、異形の鬼に襲われてしまう。彼を救ったのは、偶然出会った少女だった…。なぜか、強くその少女に惹かれる木曽だが、少女は自らを『鬼の花燭』だと告げてきて――？
description.ru:
Во время журналистского расследования Кисо едва не лишается жизни: девушка с глазами санпаку внезапно спасает его и так же внезапно исчезает в чьих-то объятиях.
История о Ширауме и Джине, демоне и его касёку. История любви, словно цветок распустившаяся на грани жизни и смерти…
Но как молодая девушка оказалась связана с демоном, пожирающим души? Что скрывает эта парочка? Как они связаны со странной болезнью?
Чтобы узнать это, придется заглянуть в прошлое...
description.pt-br: Surgiu uma doença misteriosa que fez com que, um dia as pessoas voltassem repentinamente do Mundo Inferior. A Morte Fulminante. Quando Kiso, um jornalista de jornal, começa a investigar a estranha doença, ele é atacado por um demônio de aparência grotesca. Quem o salva é uma garota que ele conheceu por acaso… A garota, por quem Kiso é peculiarmente atraído, por algum motivo se autodenomina uma “Luz Ardente do Demônio”…?

title.en: Shiretto Sugee Koto Itteru Gal. - Shiritsu Paranomaru Koukou no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: しれっとすげぇこと言ってるギャル。ー私立パラの丸高校の日常ー

altTitles.ja-ro: Shiretto Sugee Koto Itteru Gal. - Shiritsu Para no Maru Koukou no Nichijou

altTitles.en: The Gals Who Always Say Incredible Things: My Daily Life at a Private Paranormal High School

description.en:
Youth = friendship, effort, and future prediction! A very ordinary and supernatural daily life led by the strongest and most invincible gyarus with different abilities.

Based on the short animations on Youtube. 
- [Official YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@parako)
- [Official Twitter/X](https://twitter.com/parako_official)
___
[Alt Official Raw (Young Jump)](https://ynjn.jp/title/11987)
description.ja: 青春＝友情、努力、未来予知!? 最強無敵の異能力ギャルが送る、ごくごく普通の超常的な日常。 累計再生数1.6億回！本作の元となったYoutubeチャンネル「私立パラの丸高校」では、みらい＆ へー子の最強異能力ギャルズの他、光やクラスメイト達の声優ボイス付き動画がたくさん見れるので、ぜひチェックしてみてください!!

altTitles.ja: GTO パラダイス・ロスト

description.en:
The next stage for Great Teacher Onizuka Eikichi is a prison! 

Arrested due to an incident caused in his class, one that he was made assistant teacher of only six months ago! A newly established performing arts class at Kissho Academy High School, created for students who work in various media industries! Onizuka, who says he has no regrets whatsoever, quietly begins to tell the truth of the incident in prison. 

At last the decades-spanning story of Eikichi Onizuka comes to a dramatic conclusion!

*This is the continuation of the GTO: Paradise Lost story under a new name as the author changed publishers. The content is the same as the Young Magazine serialization "GTO Paradise Lost" up until episode 99, but there will be additions and corrections from that point on.

altTitles.es-la: El camino a casa después de la escuela

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

altTitles.vi: Câu lạc bộ siêu cấp về nhà

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.tl: Inimbitahan si Shun sa Klab ng Uwian ni Naoki Satou, na kilala rin bilang "Chokki-chan". Kahit na tumanggi siya, napasama pa rin siya sa mga gawain ng klab sa medyo pilit na paraan! Isang romantikong komedya tungkol sa Klab ng Uwian na tampok ang isang hayskul na dalaga na mahilig maglibot at isang bagong estudyante sa hayskul na nawalan ng pangarap.
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.
description.pt-br: Shun foi convidado para o Clube vá-para casa por Naoki Satou, também conhecido como "Chokki-chan". Apesar de recusar, ele acaba se envolvendo de alguma forma nas atividades do clube! Uma comédia romântica do Clube vá-para casa apresentando uma colegial amante de desvios e um novo aluno do ensino médio que perdeu seu sonho.

description.en:
A spin-off gag manga of "Kaiju No. 8"!

The defense force members risk their lives to protect people from approaching monsters. But even these members have "off-duty" days to relieve their daily fatigue! Don't miss the hilarious vacations the members of the force have to offer!
description.ja:
『怪獣8号』のスピンオフギャグ漫画！

迫りくる怪獣から命がけで人々を守る防衛隊員。そんな彼らの非番の姿を描いた物語！　日比野カフカは同期のレノとキコルと共に登山へ行くことになり…？

altTitles.ja: ゴエティア・ショック
オタクも恋も連鎖する

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku mo Koi mo Rensa suru

description.en:
"The girl sitting next to me, Kakoi Yuzuru, has the cutest face. Alas, she also has an absolute stunner of a boyfriend, Kawai Chihiro. And me? Well, I’m just their biggest shipper, Otonari Wataru, living out a happy-go-lucky high school life!"

A school-life romcom revolving around an avid shipper otaku who has been blessed with killer looks for no good reason!
description.ja: 隣の席の栫結鶴（かこいゆづる）さんは顔が可愛い。でも彼女には爆絶イケメン彼氏の河合千将（かわいちひろ）くんがいる。そして俺…音成和汰琉（おとなりわたる）はそんな二人をカプで推してバラ色の高校生活を送ってます！

altTitles.ja: マーメイドメロディー　『ぴちぴちピッチ　ａｑｕａ』

description.en: Lukia Nanami is turning seventeen. Her family has just moved to a town by the sea, and on her first walk down to the beach, she saves a handsome surfer from drowning. The next day, she’s shocked to discover he’s not only a classmate at her new school, but has no idea who she is, and insists he was saved by a mermaid! A new chapter in the saga of *Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch*, from original artist Pink Hanamori! [Kodansha]

altTitles.ja: エロティカル・ウイザードと12人の花嫁

description.en:
Junpei Ichinose, a student at a magic school in Tokyo, is a dropout who has never discovered his magic aptitude. Suddenly, the beautiful witch Meryl appears before him and tells him, "I need your power, the reincarnation of the Demon King". Junpei finds out that he has the power of the Demon King. He learns that he has the power of the Demon King, and his secret is revealed to Sonia, a beautiful girl who is a descendant of a brave warrior. Junpei, who has no intention of becoming a Demon King, persuades Sonia to teach him how to use his power properly. However, the Demon King's power is the strongest and worst "erotic magic"!

The harem school battle to master H-magic with beautiful girls is about to begin!
description.id: Junpei Ichinose, seorang siswa sekolah sihir di Tokyo, dia adalah seorang penyihir gagal. Tapi tiba-tiba, penyihir cantik Meryl muncul di hadapannya dan mengatakan kepadanya, "Aku membutuhkan kekuatanmu, reinkarnasi Raja Iblis". Junpei mengetahui bahwa dia memiliki kekuatan Raja Iblis. dan rahasianya terungkap kepada Sonia, seorang gadis cantik yang merupakan keturunan pahlawan. Junpei, yang tidak berniat menjadi Raja Iblis, membujuk Sonia untuk mengajarinya cara menggunakan kekuatannya dengan benar. Namun, kekuatan Raja Iblisnya adalah kekuatan "sihir erotis".
description.ja: 魔法学校の落ちこぼれが目覚めた力はエロ限定!?美少女たちとHな魔法を極めるハーレム学園バトル開幕!!

description.en:
Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
description.es-la:
Errante, imponente, en algún lugar del vasto vacío espacial, Rendezvous espera! La única estación espacial construida dentro de un ser vivo, que aloja a los mejores científicos, guerreros, exploradores e ingenieros de la galaxia.
Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムF90クラスター

description.en: Universal Century 0121: A battle known as the First Oldsmobile War erupted on Mars. The Earth Federation Forces 13th Experimental Combat Group thought they had quelled the Mars Independent Zeon Forces. But the battle for the Fastest Formula is far from over! A new tale from the F90FF begins on Mars... Where all Formulas converge!
Controlling the Queendom of Sebek's female prison with the Power of the Kraken!
description.id: Shimizu Kuuma, seorang laki-laki, yang baru saja kembali dari wawancara kerja yang tidak bisa dia selesaikan, tiba-tiba dikirim ke dunia lain, di sana dia bertemu dengan seorang gadis tertentu yang membantunya dan memberinya pekerjaan di penjara tetapi yang tidak dia ketahui adalah bahwa ini hanya jebakan untuk membawanya dan agar dia bisa 'dinikmati' oleh Bosnya, kemudian setelah dia dibantai dan dibuang ke laut dan hampir mati dia diselamatkan oleh Kraken yang menceritakan kisahnya tentang bagaimana Dia diselamatkan oleh seorang gadis tertentu yang adalah seorang tahanan, jadi mereka membuat kesepakatan, kemudian dia menyelamatkan gadis itu dan melakukan Pembalasan.
description.ja: 就職難に悩む男子学生・クウマは、いきなり異世界に飛ばされてしまう。そこで女監獄・海獄城に連れて行かれたクウマは、海の覇者・魔獣クラーケンと融合し、絶大なイカの異能力を得る。陰謀で死刑囚にされたゼイナ姫の救出を託され、クウマは海獄城に獄卒として潜り込むが、そこには個性豊かな女囚たちが待ち受けていた……。クウマは女囚たちをイカの力で心もカラダも攻略し、ゼイナ姫を助けることが出来るのか!?
description.es-la: Shimizu Kuuma es un chico que siempre devuelve los favores. Un día, al regresar de una entrevista de trabajo fallida, es repentinamente transportado a otro mundo. En este mundo es salvado por una chica, quien le ofrece un trabajo como guardia de una prisión de mujeres. Sin pensarlo dos veces, Kuuma acepta, pero no se imaginó, que sería casi asesinado por una prisionera. Ellas tiran su cuerpo al mar, pero antes de morir, la criatura más fuerte del mar, el Kraken, lo salva y le ofrece fusionarse con él a cambio de algo. Es así como Kuuma sobrevive, consigue los poderes del Kraken y está dispuesto a tomar el control de la prisión para devolverle el favor al Kraken.

title.en: Harem Ou no Isekai Press Manyuuki ~Saikyou Musou no Ojisan wa Arayuru Shuzoku wo Yome ni suru~

altTitles.ja: ハーレム王の異世界プレス漫遊記 ～最強無双のおじさんはあらゆる種族を嫁にする～

altTitles.en: Harem King's Press Journey in Another World: The Strongest Warrior Uncle Takes Wives from All Races

description.en: The erotic-comedy fantasy begins with a gentleman uncle who brings justice while doing some consensual seeding here and there.
description.es:
Un hombre que había muerto en soledad pidió a la diosa Nike que lo reencarnara en una «versión variante de un Tanetsuke Ojisan» y se reencarnó con el nombre de Genji.
Nike es convertida en la pollita 'Pinoko' como acompañante por su jefa, la diosa, y tiene que trabajar con Genji.
Tras reencarnarse, Genji confiesa su amor a Cindy, la recepcionista del gremio, pero ella le rechaza, diciendo que le gustan los hombres fuertes. Entonces Genji se marcha a derrotar al dragon negro más fuerte que se rumorea en el gremio.
La comedia erótica de fantasía de un tío con buen corazón que ayuda a los débiles, aplasta a los fuertes y protege a la mujer que le gusta!
description.ja: 孤独死してしまった男は女神ニケに「動けるバージョンの種付けおじさん」になりたいと願い、自らにゲンジと名付けて転生した。ニケは上司の女神にお目付け役としてひよこの「ぴのこ」にされてしまいゲンジと行動をともにすることに。ゲンジは冒険者ギルドの受付嬢であるシンディに告白するが、強い男が好きなのと断られてしまう。そこで彼女に受け入れてもらうため、ギルドで噂になっていた最強の黒竜討伐へ向かうことになり――。
description.es-la:
Un hombre que había muerto en soledad pidió a la diosa Nike que lo reencarnara en una «versión variante de un Tanetsuke Ojisan» y se reencarnó con el nombre de Genji.
Nike es convertida en la pollita 'Pinoko' como acompañante por su jefa, la diosa, y tiene que trabajar con Genji.
Tras reencarnarse, Genji confiesa su amor a Cindy, la recepcionista del gremio, pero ella le rechaza, diciendo que le gustan los hombres fuertes. Entonces Genji se marcha a derrotar al dragon negro más fuerte que se rumorea en el gremio.
La comedia erótica de fantasía de un tío con buen corazón que ayuda a los débiles, aplasta a los fuertes y protege a la mujer que le gusta!

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

title.en: On My Way To See My Mom

altTitles.en: On the Way to Meet Mom

description.en:
Mori, a child found by a rescue team in an abandoned house, wakes up in a shelter. While adapting to an unfamiliar life, one day, he begins to be looked after with unconditional love from a mysterious sponsor... And then Mori learns about the existence of a "mom" when a close friend leaves with hers. The child starts to wonder about the sponsor: "Could this person... be my mom?"
This is the story of Mori's long and challenging journey to find his mom.
description.ko: 폐가에서 발견된 아이 '모리'는 구조대에 의해 보호소에서 눈을 뜬다. 익숙하지 않은 생활에 적응하던 어느 날 후원자에게 조건 없는 사랑을 받고 자라는데.. 친하게 지내던 친구가 엄마와 떠나고, 엄마라는 존재가 있다는 걸 알게 된 아이는 생각한다. 혹시 이 사람이.. 나의 엄마가 아닐까? 모리의 멀고도 험한 엄마 만나러 가는 이야기.

description.en:
Fushimi-san, the janitor at a certain high school, cuts quite a figure. She's tall, cheerful, hard-working, and loves canned coffee. When the students at the school are going through times of trouble, pain, or confusion, she's there to lend a helping hand or a shoulder to cry on. When you feel like the adults in your life don't have your back... Fushimi-san probably will!

This wonderful slice of life by Onodera Kokoro follows various poignant stories of adolescence and the desire of young people to be seen and heard, especially when times are hard.

Pah Doyeon, a college student living in an old apartment building, gets used to the thugs coming to her neighbor's door every day. One day, when she sees the thugs trying to break into her neighbor's house, she unwittingly hides her next-door neighbor, Jinju, in her apartment... Looking at Jinju, who is much older than her, Doyeon gradually becomes engulfed in an unknown desire. How will their awkward cohabitation end?

From Webtoon: A high school girl who rises to pretty girl fame in her school after she masters the art of make-up via YouTube.  
From Naver: Everyone has a secret. Then what kind of secret does a goddess have?
description.pt-br:
Depois de assistir a vídeos de beleza on-line, uma fã tímida de quadrinhos domina a arte da maquiagem e vê seu status social subir rapidamente quando ela se torna a garota mais bonita da escola literalmente da noite para o dia.

Mas seu status de elite terá vida curta? Quanto tempo ela pode manter seu "eu verdadeiro" em segredo?

E o garoto fofo que ela gosta? Você poderia imaginar se ele descobrisse a verdade?

altTitles.fr: Le chevalier qui ne vit qu'aujourd'hui

description.en: Is dying repeatedly a blessing? Enkrid's life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach, until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day! Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat, just how far can he go?
description.pt-br: "Você é um gênio." Essas palavras que ele ouviu quando era criança eram veneno. Encrid sonhava em ser um cavaleiro, mas logo percebeu que era fútil. "Quer viver pela espada com esse nível de habilidade?" Uns davam risada dele. "Apenas desista." Outros aconselhavam contra. Mesmo assim, o sonho dele não morreu. Ele dormia menos, corria mais, e se esforçava pra caramba. Um dia, morreu, com uma espada perfurando sua garganta. Encrid abriu os olhos novamente para a "manhã de hoje".

title.en: Douyara Watashi no Karada wa Kanzen Muteki no You Desu ne

altTitles.ja: どうやら私の身体は完全無敵のようですね

altTitles.en: It Seems My Body Is Completely Invincible

description.en:
On her deathbed, a sickly young girl wishes to be reborn with a strong body that will never succumb to anyone or anything. Lo and behold, her wish is granted! Upon reincarnating into another world as Mary Regalia, she discovers her new body has maxed-out attributes, from physical strength to defense—even magic. But wait! That isn’t what she really wanted! All she longed for was a normal life. Baffled by God’s choice to grant her wish in this most unexpected way, Mary tries to spend her days as uneventfully as possible. The hitch is...nothing’s harder than living a normal life when you’re absolutely invincible!

---
   **Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3881dn/) (Raw)
 - **[** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FS01200196010000_68/) **|** [NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/32810) **]** (Raw)

Rin and Len are older sister and younger brother, siblings in a samurai family that rules in the land of Musashi. They lived there happily with their uncle, the current clan leader. Len has started to feel guilty about Rin's wooing. Then, one day, they fnd out that there have been talks with the land of Owari about Len taking part in a political marriage. Rin is against losing the man she loves, while Len accepts reality. The name of the girl who holds their fates in her hand is… Miku. This is a comicalization of a popular Japanese rock-style song created by the popular singer OSTER project and the illustrations of the popular artist Chiho!

title.en: Kuni ni Saikyou no Barrier wo Hattara Heiwa ni Narisugite Tsuihousaremashita ~Ore no Mahou ga Yabasugite, Bijo to Mazoku ni Kakomarerun da ga!?~

altTitles.ja: 国に最強のバリアを張ったら平和になりすぎて追放されました。～俺の魔法がヤバすぎて、美女と魔族に囲まれてるんだが！？～

altTitles.en: When I Put up the Strongest Barrier in the Country, It Became Too Peaceful and I Was Banished. They Did Know That That Barrier Isn't Permanent, Right?

altTitles.es-la: Cuando levanté la barrera más fuerte del país, se volvió demasiado pacífico y me desterraron. ¿Sabían que esa barrera no es permanente, verdad?

description.en: A young man, Shield, can only use the beginner magic [Barrier] and has been looked down upon. Despite putting up an ironclad barrier to protect the country, he is deported due to his fiancée's tricks. However, before he knew it, he had subjugated the strongest dragon (a young girl), was courted by beautiful women from other countries, and was being followed by a group of brutal demons!?
description.ja:
強固なバリアに覆われた大国ヘレナは、魔物からも守られて繁栄の一途をたどっていた。そんなバリアを張ったシールド・レイアレスは宮廷魔法師として高い地位を築いてはいたが、バリア魔法しか使えないと周囲からは見下されていた。そんな矢先、シールドの婚約パーティーでいきなり国家反逆罪で追放されてしまう…!

国を追われて金も地位も失い、人生のドン底に落ちたシールドだったが、彼が唯一使えるバリア魔法は常人離れしたとんでもないものだった! そんな規格外の力を求めて、ドラゴンや異国の美女たち、終いには凶悪な魔族たちにまで狙われていく…!?

description.en:
Aki Uchiyama, the writer who led the "bishojo" (beautiful girl) and "lolicon boom" in adult magazines, brought the flavor of his works published in adult magazines directly to boys' magazines in this extremely problematic work. Although the story is styled as a science fiction fantasy comedy about a pretty elementary school girl named Tsukasa, who is a test subject for strange inventions. She is made to wear underwear, diapers, and half-naked clothes, not to mention all the tricks she's played on. Perverse and erotic expressions are the main themes of the works. The author, Aki Uchiyama, also published an adult-oriented self-parody work, "Ankoro-Trio," at about the same time as this work.

While originally published as shonen, later prints are labeled for adults because the contents was considered harmful. [+18 don't tag as shonen]

Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

description.en:
A struggling 29-year-old single woman faces hardships due to irregular employment in her dream city, Tokyo. Hearing from a coworker that it can be a good side-income, she decides to offer her uterus to a stranger and become a surrogate mother.

(Source: Manga Mogura RE, edited)

Note: Based on the novel of the same name by Natsuo Kirino.

title.en: The 53 Year Old Online Gamer's First IRL Meet-Up

altTitles.ja: 53歳で初めてオフ会に参加しました

altTitles.ja-ro: 53-sai de Hajimete Off-kai ni Sanka Shimashita

description.en:
Let's go to the offline meet-up with online gaming friends!

"MAKOTO" is a middle-aged man and newbie gamer who's excited for his offline meeting with "Ao", a veteran adventurer who has always been helping him out. However, the one who appeared for the meeting was... an elementary school boy!?

altTitles.tr: Seraph of the End: Kıyamet Meleği

altTitles.pl: Seraph of the End: Serafin Dni Ostatnich

altTitles.en: Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign

description.en: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.
description.ru:
В стремлении к запретным знаниям «человек разумный» опять напортачил — в 2012 году на волю вырвался смертельный вирус, начавший косить человечество. Умирали почему-то взрослые, и тут, откуда ни возьмись, явились вампиры и согнали оставшихся детей в свой подземный город, объявив, что отныне «людишки» будут жить под защитой клыкастых хозяев, расплачиваясь кровью. Резкий парень Юитиро пожил так 4 года и понял, что пора валить — вместе с названным братом Микой и всей «семьей Хьякуя», группой детей, выросшей в одном приюте. Конечно, вампиры легко догнали и перебили беглецов, ушел лишь один.   
Выйдя на поверхность, юный Хьякуя понял, что эпидемия кончилась, но мир изменился — кругом разруха, бродят демоны, а кровососы потихоньку расширяют территорию, предлагая жителям «крышу». Власть в Японии захватила семья Хиираги, сформировавшая Имперскую Демоническую армию, которая защищает людей и бьет вампиров зачарованным оружием. Свой путь Юитиро ясен — готовиться к службе, мстить за погибшую родню. Прямого и порывистого парня ждет немало сюрпризов и неожиданностей, но в таком поганом мире лучше надеяться на свой дар и свой меч, чем на волю судьбы и благосклонность правителей!
description.pt-br: Um dia, um vírus misterioso apareceu na Terra e matou todos os humanos infectados com mais de 13 anos. Ao mesmo tempo, vampiros emergiram dos recantos sombrios do mundo e escravizaram a humanidade. Entra Hyakuya Yuuichirou, um menino que, junto com o resto das crianças de seu orfanato, é tratado como gado pelos vampiros. Mesmo em cativeiro, Yuuichirou sonha grande. Ele sonha em matar vampiros. Ele sonha em matar todos eles.

altTitles.ja: 三咲くんは攻略キャラじゃない

altTitles.ja-ro: Misaki-kun wa Kouryaku Chara ja Nai

description.en: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!
description.ja: ここはギャルゲーの世界。 親友キャラ・三咲泉の使命は、主人公・季原晴太のヒロイン攻略のサポート…のはずが、 肝心の季原は何故か三咲を攻略するつもりで――!? 「男の子のままヒロインになってくれ！」 友情？愛情？男の娘ハッピー胸キュンコメディ!!

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

Arata Natsume works at a child guidance center, is in his thirties and single with no plans for marriage. But one day, he receives a request from the child he was in charge of, Takuto, to “meet the criminal who killed his father”. That serial killer is Shinagawa Shinju, also known as the “Shinagawa Pierrot”.

Won the 70th Shougakukan Manga Award.
description.fr: “Le clown de Shinagawa” avait défrayé la chronique lors de son arrestation : cette tueuse en série corpulente, déguisée en clown, avait découpé et caché les corps de ses victimes… Pour aider l'enfant d'une victime à retrouver la tête de son père, Arata Natsume, assistant social, va la rencontrer. Mais contre toute attente, une frêle et fragile jeune fille arrive en face de lui. Est-elle vraiment un monstre sanguinaire ? Pour le savoir, Arata va devoir se livrer à un jeu dangereux en se prétendant amoureux d'elle…
description.ja:
これは、最も一線を越える「結婚」！！

児童相談所に勤務する夏目アラタは、結婚に夢など抱いていない30代・独身。彼はある日、担当児童・卓斗から「父を殺した犯人に代わりに会って欲しい」という依頼を受ける。犯人の名は品川真珠。【品川ピエロ】と呼ばれる有名連続殺人犯だった…！！
description.pt: Natsume trabalha no conselho tutelar, está em seus trinta anos e solteiro, sem planos para casa. Mas um dia, ele recebe um pedido de uma criança a qual estava a cargo, de "encontrar o criminoso que matou seu pai". Tal assassino é a serial killer Shinagawa Shinu, também conhecida como "Pierrot Shinagawa".
description.vi: Arata Tsume làm việc tại một trung tâm hỗ trợ trẻ em, ở độ tuổi 30, độc thân và chưa có kế hoạch kết hôn. Nhưng một ngày nọ, anh nhận được thỉnh cầu từ đứa trẻ mà anh đang chăm sóc, Takuto, để "gặp tên tội phạm đã giết cha mình". Kẻ giết người hàng loạt đó là Shinagawa Shinju, còn được gọi là "Tên hề Shinagawa".
description.es-la: Arata Natsume trabaja en un centro de orientación infantil, tiene más de treinta años y está soltero sin planes de matrimonio. Pero un día recibe una petición del niño que tenía a su cargo, Takuto, para "conocer al criminal que mató a su padre". Ese asesino en serie es Shinagawa Shinju, también conocido como el "Shinagawa Pierrot".

title.en: Kaifuku Jutsushi no Yarinaoshi ~Sokushi Mahou to Skill Copy no Chouetsu Heal~

altTitles.ja: 回復術士のやり直し～即死魔法とスキルコピーの超越ヒール～

altTitles.es-la: El Reinicio Como Sanador ~La Magia de Muerte Instantánea Con La Habilidad de Copiar La Curación Trascendental~

description.de: Keyaru wurde durch sein Unwissen immer und immer wieder ausgenutzt. Aber eines Tages erkannte er die wahre Macht der Heilmagie und kam zu der Überzeugung, dass ein Heiler die stärkste Klasse sei. Wie auch immer, ehe ihm das Potential eines Heilers klar wurde, war er bereits allem beraubt worden. Daher wandte er seine Heilmagie auf die Welt selbst an und reiste so 4 Jahre in der Zeit zurück. Er würde sich für alles rächen, was man ihm angetan hatte. Dies ist die kranke heldenhafte Geschichte eines Heilers, der der stärkste wurde, indem er sein Wissen über Heilung und seine Erfahrungen aus seinem vorherigen Leben kombiniert.
description.en:
"Healing magicians cannot fight alone."

Keyaru, who was bound by this common knowledge, was exploited again and again by others. But one day, he noticed what lay beyond healing magic, and was convinced that a healing magician was the strongest class. However, by the time he realized that potential, he was deprived of everything. Thus, he used healing magic on the world itself to go back four years, deciding to redo everything.
description.it:
"I maghi curatori non possono combattere da soli." Keyaru, che era legato a questa conoscenza comune, fu sfruttato più e più volte dagli altri.  
Ma un giorno notò cosa c'era oltre la guarigione della magia e si convinse che il mago guaritore fosse la classe più forte. Tuttavia, quando ne realizzò il potenziale, fu privato di tutto. Così, usando la magia curativa sul mondo stesso, è tornato indietro di quattro anni, determinato a ricominciare tutto da capo.
description.ja: 【癒】の勇者ケヤルは、ある日【回復(ヒール)】が最強に至る魔法だと確信する。そして世界そのものを【回復】して四年前に戻り、自分の人生を弄んだ者たちへ復讐することを誓うのだった。
description.pl:
"Uzdrowiciele nie mogą walczyć w pojedynkę."  
Keare, który wiedział o tym aż za dobrze, był raz po raz wykorzystywany przez innych.  
Ale pewnego dnia odkrywa coś, co kryje się poza magią uzdrowienia, i zyskuje pewność, że uzdrowiciel to najpotężniejsza z klas maga. Jednakże zanim zdał sobie sprawę z jej potencjału, został już pozbawiony wszystkiego, co miał. Dlatego właśnie użył magii uzdrowienia na samym świecie, by cofnąć się w czasie o cztery lata, postanawiając, że zacznie wszystko od nowa.  
Oto heroiczna opowieść o pewnym uzdrowicielu, który stał się najsilniejszym dzięki wykorzystaniu wiedzy z dawnego życia i magii uzdrawiania.
description.pt-br:
"Magos de cura não podem lutar sozinhos." 

Keare, que estava vinculado por esse conhecimento comum, foi explorado uma vez ou outra pelos outros. Mas um dia, ele notou o que estava além da magia de cura e estava convencido de que um mago de cura era a classe mais forte. No entanto, quando percebeu esse potencial, ele estava privado de tudo. Assim, ele usou a magia de cura no próprio mundo para voltar quatro anos, decidindo refazer tudo. Este é um conto heroico de um mago de cura que se tornou o mais forte usando o conhecimento de sua vida passada e magia de cura.

description.en:
A man with the ability to hear inner voices got married to a girl who can't speak.  
  
It's the Taisho era. Kyogoku Kazunari, who can hear people's inner voices, makes skillful use of his ability by running a trading company.  
His business is going well, but due to his power, he cannot trust others and has been quite bitter so far.   
Wanting to make use of their connections, Kazunari has propposed to marry the daughter of the noble Suwabe family. However, not only can he not hear the inner voice of his partner Suwabe Nana, she is also unable to speak.  
While Kazunari is bewildered, the two of them get married on the spur of the moment…? A clumsy but happy married life begins for them.
description.id:
Seorang pria dengan kemampuan untuk mendengar suara hati menikah dengan seorang gadis yang tidak dapat berbicara.
  
Ini adalah era Taisho. Kyogoku Kazunari, yang dapat mendengar suara hati orang, memanfaatkan kemampuannya dengan terampil dengan menjalankan perusahaan perdagangan.
Bisnisnya berjalan dengan baik, tetapi karena kekuatannya, dia tidak dapat mempercayai orang lain dan telah cukup pahit sejauh ini.
Ingin memanfaatkan koneksi mereka, Kazunari telah melamar putri dari keluarga bangsawan Suwabe. Namun, tidak hanya dia tidak dapat mendengar suara batin pasangannya Suwabe Nana, dia juga tidak dapat berbicara.
Sementara Kazunari bingung, mereka berdua menikah mendadak…? Kehidupan pernikahan yang canggung tapi bahagia dimulai untuk mereka.
description.ru:
Мужчина, который может слышать чужие мысли, женится на немой девушке.

Эпоха Тайсё. Кёгоку Казунари, который может слышать мысли людей, умело использует эту способность, управляя торговой компанией. Его бизнес успешен, но из-за дара Кёгоку никому не может доверять, и другие считают его нелюдимым.

Для укрепления связей Казунари решил жениться на дочери знатного рода Сувабэ. Однако он не слышит её мыслей, к тому же Сувабэ Нана – немая.

Казунари был сбит с толку, но это не помешало им успешно пожениться. У них начинается неловкая, но счастливая супружеская жизнь.

title.en: Age Gap Sisters Who Have Reached That Age

altTitles.ja-ro: Souiu Toshigoro ni Natchatta Toshinosa Shimai

altTitles.en: The Age Gap Sister is at That Age

altTitles.ja: そういう年頃になっちゃった年の差姉妹

description.en: Two sisters, with ten years separating them. Once close, they grew distant with time. As the younger sister enters high school, their relationship once again begins to change. This time in an unusual direction.

altTitles.ja: 搾り取らないで、女商人さん

description.en: Tartaros: A mysterious and massive underground dungeon. There, adventurers are engaged in a night and day struggle to find the treasure they seek. Lavi the New Adventurer is taking on the challenge of Tartaros, but has a problem. A renowned dark merchant, Philo the Beastkin, is pestering him to buy her strange items! She pushes items (often erotic) onto Lavi for him to use in every situation they come across. What will become of Lavi’s adventures?! Is he willing to buy anything from this adorably annoying merchant girl?!
description.es:
el Misterioso laberinto subterráneo gigante "Tartaros".

Allí, los aventureros de día y de noche se aventuran en buscan tesoros y otras riquezas. El aventurero novato Lavi (shota) que desafió el calabozo "tartaros" y que para su mala suerte se mete en algunos problemas, Es en ese instante cuando conoció a la mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu), con quien hace un trato para ser su cliente habitual. ¿Qué pasará con la aventura de Lavi? ¡seguirá Comprándole ítem a esta belleza y hermosa!  
  
¡¡¡la comedia de fantasía sobre el aventurero novato Lavi (shota) y la comerciante mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu)!!
description.ja:
ウザカワ商人、アイテム押し売りでエロい目に!?

「クソッ! ややムカつくけどすげえ可愛い!!」

謎の巨大地下迷宮「タルタロス」に挑む新米冒険者・ラビ。そんな彼にはある悩みがあった。それは謎多き女商人・フィロにめちゃくちゃウザ絡をされ、変なアイテムを売りつけてくる!! しかもこの商人、とんでもなくポンコツで毎回エロい目に(商人が)!? 果たして、ラビの冒険はどうなってしまうのか!? こんなウザカワ系商人なら買っちゃう!?

description.en:
He was content with a mediocre life, but then appeared a classmate who spoke earnestly of her dreams.
At that moment, he...?!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.ja:
人生そこそこで良いと思っていた主人公の前に現れた、夢をまっすぐに語る同級生。
その時、主人公は――!?
